$$
\begin{aligned}
&\ \textbf{Multinomial probability of selection of choice}_{i}\ \textbf{in respondent}_{j} \\
\text{Choice}_{i_j} \sim&\ \operatorname{Categorical}\big(\{\mu_{1,i_j},\,\mu_{2,i_j},\,\mu_{3,i_j}\}\big) \\[10pt]
&\ \textbf{Model for probability of each option} \\
\{\mu_{1,i_j},\,\mu_{2,i_j},\,\mu_{3,i_j}\} =&\ (\beta_0 + b_{0_j}) \\
&\ + \beta_1\,\text{rbi[Reduced price]}_{i_j}
  + \beta_2\,\text{rbi[Full price]}_{i_j} \\
&\ + \beta_3\,\text{ubi[Event space rental]}_{i_j}
  + \beta_4\,\text{ubi[Running a pizza shop]}_{i_j} \\
&\ + \beta_5\,\text{nonprofit type[Student tutoring center]}_{i_j}
  + \beta_6\,\text{nonprofit type[Urban forestry center]}_{i_j}
  + \beta_7\,\text{nonprofit type[Mental health center]}_{i_j} \\
&\ + \beta_8\,\text{use of donations[Capacity building]}_{i_j}
  + \beta_9\,\text{use of donations[Rainy day funds]}_{i_j}
  + \beta_{10}\,\text{use of donations[Unrestricted use]}_{i_j} \\
&\ + \beta_{11}\,\text{financial situation[Under financial stress]}_{i_j} \\[6pt]
b_{0_j} \sim&\ \mathcal{N}(0,\sigma_0)\quad \text{Respondent-specific offset from global probability} \\[10pt]
&\ \textbf{Priors} \\
\beta_{0\dots 11} \sim&\ \mathcal{N}(0,3) \\
\sigma_0 \sim&\ \operatorname{Exponential}(1)
\end{aligned}
$$
